document.full_text: citigroup inc  has hired trip wolfe to head venture capital coverage for north america within the bank's technology, media and telecoms group, according to an internal memo obtained by reuters on thursday.
document.title: citi hires trip wolfe as venture capital banker: memo
lines_and_colors: citigroup inc  has hired trip wolfe to head venture capital coverage for north america within the bank's technology, media and telecoms group, according to an internal memo obtained by reuters on thursday.
